dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
Copyright Infringement

This person is offering illegal and pirated copies of my books which include:

Reversal Magic

Reversal Magic is authored by me, Michael Parsons, and only available directly from me. No person has been authorized to distribute them, including this person in question. This person is selling them.

The person who is violating my copyright is posting as robietrader and has as an e-mail address anber...@yahoo.com

The posting of issue is:

http://groups.google.com/group.misc.invest.technical.msg.5242910017ee0746?


My contact information is:

Michael Parsons
E-Mail address mike@reversalmagic.com

PO Box 675
Prince Frederick, MD 20678

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described ahin e on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear. under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Michael Parsons
